interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Tinksky Nail Art Stamping Printing Plate Manicure Stamping Image Plate Templates with Stamp Pack of 10 (Silver) Review Date: 2016/07/18 Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 3.6 x 1.2 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '889736846560'} Review Text: I love to use nail stamping in my manicures. It is fairly easy to learn how to do, it's incredibly fun and really can amp up the look of your nails. The downside of all that is it can get expensive!! This 11 piece set from Tinksky is a great value for all that you get, and is perfect for anyone that either wants to try it out -or- wants to build up a variety of images. Granted, there aren't any examples shown of the stamping plates that you'll get, so that's a little bit of a mystery. If you don't mind that, I do recommend this set!!
Attached are photos of the plates that I received... I am super happy to have the images that I received and although I don't love the stamper, it is nice to have!! Keep in mind that you may have to experiment with your technique and try different polishes with these plates. Just because you may not get an image to pickup on the first or second try does not mean that the plate is trash. Not all stamper heads and polishes will work together nicely from plate to plate. Having said all that, I have had pretty good experiences using these and I am a beginner.
I was given a promotional discount on my purchase in exchange for my review.
Would I buy it again at full price? You bet!! Would I recommend it to a friend? Absolutely!!
***IMAGES IN MY SET (IN ORDER OF APPEARANCE)***
1. Ocean Elements
2. Butterflies/Flowers
3. Garden Scenery (Full Plate Buffet Style Image)
4. Shoe Couture
5. Horse & Carriage (Full Plate Buffet Style Image) Moyou London knockoff
6. French Motifs
7. Easter Icons
8. Masquerade Masks
9. Pop Comics
10. Designer French Tips
Thanks for reading my review and have a great day!! : ) Review Title: A great set for beginners and collectors too!! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
PURE Castor Oil with Sweet Almond Oil, Coconut Oil and Vitamin E Oil - Best Hair Growth, Regrowth, & Conditioning Oil Blend for Eyelashes & Eyebrows. 100% Natural - NO Parabens, Fillers or Toxins Mia Adora ['Short thinning lashes, brows, or other hair?', 'Forget harsh chemicals & growth products used around your eyes with possible long term side effects! MEET the', 'FABULOUS FOUR', 'super oil blend…', 'We’ve created a proprietary blend of the four most powerful & researched oils to', 'help thicken & strengthen your short thin hairs naturally.', 'May also be used as a', 'natural eye makeup remover that conditions lashes & prevents lash fallout.', 'Castor Oil –', 'This thick seed oil traditionally used to treat hair loss, conditions & lubricates hair, nourishes hair follicles with vitamins & fatty acids, prevents thinning & shedding of delicate hair, lashes, & brows.', 'Sweet Almond Oil –', 'Packed with nourishing vitamins that your delicate hair craves, this oil also is used to moisturize & condition hair. It strengthens hair, prevents damage & shedding while promoting growth.', 'Coconut Oil –', 'Another traditionally used oil packed with nutrients that easily penetrates hair follicles to stimulate growth & prevent loss. It also provides a lipid barrier to prevent hair damage.', 'Vitamin E Oil –', 'Powerful essential vitamin to promote hair growth by nourishing & conditioning hair follicles.', '*Our oils are cold-pressed, hexane free & packaged perfectly to preserve potency. Also comes with a no mess treatment pump which is preferred over droppers.'] {'Hair Type': 'Thick, Thin', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'Mia Adora', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.5 x 1.3 x 1.3 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '013189194309 794168039544', 'Manufacturer': 'Mia Adora'} I really like this Castor Oil blend for removing my eye makeup. It does an exceptional job of breaking down mascara. The best part of this product comes from continued use! Eyelashes become darker, shinier and a lot healthier. I've noticed less breakage and fall down after introducing this product into my skin care routine. I'm hoping to see some growth soon. I gave up on trying to use one of those so-called miracle eyelash serums because it burned my eyes so bad. This Mia Adora oil does not burn if you get it in your eyes, it just makes your vision blurry for a while. I was fortunate to have purchased this item with a promotional discount for the purpose of testing and review. I like the way it effectively breaks down and removes eye makeup. It's gentle on the delicate eye area and it's fragrance free. You can use this oil as a conditioning treatment alone, just a drop or two for each eye, and the bottle will last you a good while. The Mia Adore castor oil blend your lashes will love Tinksky Nail Art Stamping Printing Plate Manicure Stamping Image Plate Templates with Stamp Pack of 10 (Silver) {'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 3.6 x 1.2 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '889736846560'} I love to use nail stamping in my manicures. It is fairly easy to learn how to do, it's incredibly fun and really can amp up the look of your nails. The downside of all that is it can get expensive!! This 11 piece set from Tinksky is a great value for all that you get, and is perfect for anyone that either wants to try it out -or- wants to build up a variety of images. Granted, there aren't any examples shown of the stamping plates that you'll get, so that's a little bit of a mystery. If you don't mind that, I do recommend this set!!
Attached are photos of the plates that I received... I am super happy to have the images that I received and although I don't love the stamper, it is nice to have!! Keep in mind that you may have to experiment with your technique and try different polishes with these plates. Just because you may not get an image to pickup on the first or second try does not mean that the plate is trash. Not all stamper heads and polishes will work together nicely from plate to plate. Having said all that, I have had pretty good experiences using these and I am a beginner.
I was given a promotional discount on my purchase in exchange for my review.
Would I buy it again at full price? You bet!! Would I recommend it to a friend? Absolutely!!
***IMAGES IN MY SET (IN ORDER OF APPEARANCE)***
1. Ocean Elements
2. Butterflies/Flowers
3. Garden Scenery (Full Plate Buffet Style Image)
4. Shoe Couture
5. Horse & Carriage (Full Plate Buffet Style Image) Moyou London knockoff

profile:
**User Summary**

This user displays a robust preference for natural and effective beauty products, particularly in hair and skin care, prioritizing ingredients that are free from harsh chemicals, parabens, and toxins. They have a strong focus on products that promote hair growth and conditioning, especially for eyelashes and eyebrows, indicating a concern for hair health and aesthetics. Their recent engagement with nail art stamping reflects a growing interest in enhancing their manicure experience, showcasing a love for creativity and personalization in beauty routines. 

They appreciate multifunctional products that serve multiple purposes, such as conditioning treatments that double as makeup removers, to simplify their regimen. The user expresses satisfaction with products that offer visible results, while also highlighting their sensitivity to product safety, preferring gentler options over harsh chemical alternatives. 

Their review of a nail art stamping set underlines their enthusiasm for fun and decorative nail designs, indicating a more playful aspect to their beauty preferences. Despite recognizing the potential drawbacks like costs and learning curves in nail art, they are open to experimenting and recommend it for beginners. 

Overall, this user values high-quality, natural beauty solutions combined with innovative, artistic flexibility in their beauty practices, while maintaining a protective stance towards sensitive skin and hair health.
